content: hhhheeeerrrrbbbb ggggaaaarrrrddddeeeennnn sssshhhhaaaawwwwllll this is my take on a simple all knit shawl essentially not much different then many others out there the difference here is that the pattern has been modified to omit the point why because i don t like having a point trailing along behind me knocking objects off of low surfaces i don t end up sitting on the end making it easer to slip off and my favorite reason it takes less yarn and less time materials 3 skeins lion homespun the model pictured used the colorway -herb garden 10 5 circular needle use a long enough needle so that you can try on as you go cast on 50 sts row 1 knit one row across knit in tail as you go row 2 k 1 yo k1 *yo k2tog repeat from * across ending with either k2 to k1 depending on what fits row 3 k1 yo knit to end repeat row 3 until there are 170 stitches on needle this is 1x and the fabric relaxes to about 80 making gauge about 4 25 stitches per inch use that measurement to adjust the pattern to your size bind off with size 13 needle or do a loose bind off as follows k2 * k2tog on right needle k1 repeat from * across after binding off the length from neck to waist or so is about 26 inches that s it a bit of simple tv knitting that will give you something to help take the chill off © copyright nettie dilorenzo 2010 http //nettieknits1 wordpress comor ravelry nettieknits all rights reserved permission to reproduce is required
